labs.title: AWS ↔ Entra ID Workforce Identity Federation
labs.summary: Implement workforce identity federation between AWS IAM Identity Center and Microsoft Entra ID using SAML and SCIM for centralized access and automated provisioning.

labs.title: Zero Trust VPC Network Segmentation
labs.summary: Design and deploy zero trust segmentation in AWS using VPCs, security groups, NACLs, and route controls to reduce lateral movement.

labs.title: Policy-as-Code Enforcement in CI/CD
labs.summary: Enforce security and compliance using policy-as-code across Terraform CI/CD pipelines with deployment gating and automated compliance checks.
